openGraph.title: Nintendo of America
openGraph.description: Nintendo of America. 5,337,113 likes. Welcome to the official Nintendo of America Facebook page, home of all things Nintendo! For customer support, please visit support.nintendo.com.

profile_user.mentions_tab_tooltip_nux_text: See what others are posting about them.

message.text:
Wondering what critics are saying about Mario’s latest 2D side-scrolling adventure? Check it out, then jump into the unexpected with Super Mario Bros. Wonder, available now only on Nintendo Switch!

http://ninten.do/618794VNT

notice_message.text: Commenting has been turned off for this post.

body.text: Love the game, easily the best 2D game in many years. The bosses were so underwhelming though.

preferred_body.text: Love the game, easily the best 2D game in many years. The bosses were so underwhelming though.

body_renderer.text: Love the game, easily the best 2D game in many years. The bosses were so underwhelming though.

message.text:
Sprigatito, Fuecoco, and Quaxly dropped by NintendoNYC to say hi to all the Trainers!

Which Pokémon Scarlet & Pokémon Violet partner will you choose on 11/18?
ninten.do/6001dQDfN

preferred_body.text: I’m choosing Quaxly ❤

body.text: I’m choosing Sprigatito!

preferred_body.text: I saw their shiny forms. Love it. Saw their final forms. It made my choice even harder. I was gonna go for water starter but decide to go with grass starter for scarlett and I'll pick water starter for violet.

body_renderer.text: I saw their shiny forms. Love it. Saw their final forms. It made my choice even harder. I was gonna go for water starter but decide to go with grass starter for scarlett and I'll pick water starter for violet.

openGraph.title: Sprigatito, Fuecoco, and Quaxly... - Nintendo of America
openGraph.description:
Sprigatito, Fuecoco, and Quaxly dropped by NintendoNYC to say hi to all the Trainers!

Which Pokémon Scarlet & Pokémon Violet partner will you choose on...

Choose your path to earning Champion Rank as a Pokémon Trainer, meet new Pokémon, and explore an open... | By Nintendo of America | Facebook

media.name: Super Mario Bros. Wonder – Accolades Trailer

savable_description.text:
Wondering what critics are saying about Mario’s latest 2D side-scrolling adventure? Check it out, then jump into the unexpected with Super Mario Bros. Wonder, available now only on Nintendo Switch!

http://ninten.do/618794VNT

Jump into the unexpected and experience a new adventure full of the unfamiliar! 

Explore the Flower Kingdom either solo or with up to three friends when Super Mario Bros. Wonder launches on 10/20.

http://ninten.do/61889ay3p

media.name: Super Mario Bros. Wonder – Meet Elephant Mario!

savable_description.text: Create your LEGO Animal Crossing world as you want it - with Isabelle, Tom Nook, Marshal and more. Coming March 2024!
Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door from the Nintendo GameCube system will return with enhanced graphics for Nintendo Switch in 2024!
The F-ZERO game returns as a 99-player battle royale in F-ZERO 99! Available exclusively for active Nintendo Switch Online members today!
Peach and guardian Stella take the spotlight to save the Sparkle Theater—and the day—when Princess Peach: Showtime! releases for Nintendo Switch on March 22, 2024.

Assemble a group of unlikely heroes when Super Mario RPG releases for Nintendo Switch on Nov. 17! Check out how you can take on a variety of quirky foes using new features, including post-game boss rematches.

Pre-order today: http://ninten.do/61839eIdW
The rivalry that heated up on the Game Boy Advance system reignites in an updated version of Mario vs. Donkey Kong! Coming to Nintendo Switch on Feb. 16, 2024.

[Nintendo Switch Snap] [funky big band music] [Pokémon growling] [epic orchestral music
with singing vocals]
[cheery shrill] [curious snorts] [epic roar] [music intensifies]
